## Gene Details:
- **Gene ID:** [AT4G18205](https://www.arabidopsis.org/locus?name=AT4G18205)
- **Gene Symbol:** <u>AtPUP21, PUP21</u>
- **Gene Name:** purine permease 21
- **Description:**   Nucleotide-sugar transporter family protein;(source:Araport11)
- **TAIR Accession:** locus:1009023365
- **Genome:** [Araport11_genome_release](https://www.arabidopsis.org/download/list?dir=Genes%2FAraport11_genome_release)
- **Species:** *Arabidopsis thaliana*
